short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a password based on a regex string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Regex Password Generator allows you to easily copy a randomly generated password based on a regex string you provide.

Once you set the regex string in the options, just click the extension button and a random password based on the regex will be copied to your clipboard.
